QuestData.Title: Haohan's Vote I: Bungalow Break-In
QuestData.Description: This is going to be tough, $n.$B$BThe last vote we need comes from Haohan Mudclaw, the head of the Tillers Union.$B$BI know he wasn't too keen on us to start, but we've learned so much about farming, I'm sure he'll have a change of heart!$B$BGo speak to him. You can be very convincing, right?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Haohan Mudclaw at The Heartland or at Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
